passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > main > article > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h1

html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > main > article > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
